about_the_game:
In this breathtaking action-adventure saga, experience a story of power, betrayal, and destiny that unfolds across the stunning landscapes of medieval South India, as you step into the shoes of South Asia’s most formidable emperor, Rajendra Chola. 

About the game 

The year is 1025 CE. The people of Thanjavur await their king, Rajendra Chola, after his triumphant campaign in the kingdom of Sri Vijaya. As the entire city celebrates their victory, there’s chaos looming in the corner. 

Enemies gather at the borders and conspirators whisper in the courts; and the young king must face trials that will test not just his strength, but his very soul.  

Rajendra Chola must become more than just a warrior, more than just a king. He must become a legend. For in his hands lies not just the fate of the Chola Empire, but the destiny of a civilization that stands as a beacon of art, culture, and power. 

Rise, Rajendra Chola. Your throne awaits. 

A living, breathing world 

Step into a breathtaking recreation of 11th-century Thanjavur, where golden spires pierce the skies and bustling markets pulse with the lifeblood of an empire at its zenith. Explore intricately detailed temples, walk through lush paddy fields, and bear witness to the culture and traditions of the Chola empire. 

Four paths. One legacy. 

Explore multiple perspectives and experiences, making each playthrough unique, while still leading Rajendra toward his legendary destiny. Each class reflects a distinct approach to challenges— whether through unique dialogue, interactions, and approaches to challenges, allowing for varied playstyles within a consistent storyline. 

  • VALOR - Strike decisively in close combat and rain arrows upon distant foes. Wielding the sacred combination of sword, shield, and bow, you embody the quintessential warrior of the Chola empire.  

  • WARFARE - Channel the fierce spirit of the tiger, overwhelming foes with aggressive combat techniques and devastating weapon mastery. 

  • SHADOWCRAFT - Master of stealth and deception. Strike from the shadows with cunning and guile for victory comes not through power, but through patience, precision, and perfect timing. 

  • WISDOM - While others rely on steel, you wield sharp wit and keen observation to overcome obstacles. Navigate complex social situations, unravel ancient puzzles, and find peaceful solutions where others see only conflict. 

You’ll also play as multiple archetypes within each class. 

GAMEPLAY FEATURES: 

  • A rich, open-world environment designed with a "wide linear" approach, balancing guided progression with freedom to explore. 

  • Experience cultural events like folk arts, weddings and bull-taming festivals 

  • Combat system inspired by ancient Tamil martial arts, particularly Kalari; emphasizes precision, strategy, and mastery of enemy stances.
